name: easy-tiktok-video-downloader
description: Download liked videos or any TikTok videos easily without watermark. Download search results, likes, all user videos, and more.
author: Arsene I. Muhire

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && webpack --config webpack.config.js --watch && du -sh dist
scripts.buildff: rm -rf distff && webpack --config webpack.firefox.config.js --watch && du -sh distff
scripts.build:prod: rm -rf dist && webpack --mode production --config webpack.config.js && du -sh dist
scripts.buildff:prod: rm -rf distff && webpack --mode production --config webpack.firefox.config.js && du -sh distff
